text:
Myth: ‘I’ve had #COVID19, I don’t need the vaccine!’ 
Truth: Research has shown that immunity after recovering from COVID-19 may only last a few months. This means that these persons may get re-infected.

Listen to why!
 
#vaccine #PublicHealthMatters #PublicHealthEngland #CARPHA https://t.co/ND2FN2z2eC
